sentences.english: Production increased steadily. The growth rate was somewhat lower than that of last year.
sentences.chinese: 生产稳定增长，增速比上年有所回落。

sentences.english: In recent years, the growth in agriculture and the rural sector slowed and the increase in farm incomes was lagging behind that of non-agricultural incomes.
sentences.chinese: 近年来，农业和农村发展滞后，农业收入增速迟缓。

sentences.english: In western region, the growth rate of absorption of foreign investment accelerated.
sentences.chinese: 西部地区吸收外资增速加快。

sentences.english: The invention relates to an auto on-off loose-leaf wind power machine which can gather energy to increase the speed.
sentences.chinese: 本发明涉及一种聚能增速自动开合活叶式风力机。

sentences.english: Government debt is rising faster than at any time since the second world war.
sentences.chinese: 政府债务的增速比二战以来的任何时候都要快。

sentences.english: There hasn't been a substantial drop-off in the growth of power generation fueling China's growth.
sentences.chinese: 推动中国经济增长的发电量增速并没有出现明显下降。

sentences.english: Facing the whole world financial crisis, our country economical speed-up postpones.
sentences.chinese: 面对全球金融危机，我国经济增速放缓。

sentences.english: Ten place ecological environment pressure increases unceasingly, but the speed-up is quite slow.
sentences.chinese: 十地生态情况压力不时增年夜，但增速比拟迟缓。

sentences.english: That's the biggest increase among the big four banks.
sentences.chinese: 增速堪为四大银行之首。

sentences.english: This, combined with a stronger or at least stable dollar, should damp the torrid pace of export growth.
sentences.chinese: 加上美元企稳甚至走强，这将会削弱出口的增速。

sentences.english: This augurs well for the next few months, U. S. economic growth may slow further.
sentences.chinese: 这预示着未来几个月美国经济增速有可能进一步放慢。

sentences.english: Profit growth for China's auto-parts industry has slowed this year.
sentences.chinese: 中国汽车零配件行业的利润增速今年开始放缓。

sentences.english: Though the overall growth rate of industries in the coastal areas remains low, these industries are nevertheless recovering at a faster speed.
sentences.chinese: 沿海地区工业总体增速虽然较低，但恢复加快。

sentences.english: China's growth has been nothing short of stupendous.
sentences.chinese: 一直以来，中国经济的增速可以说是十分惊人的。

sentences.english: Growth in output of crude steel also dipped in October.
sentences.chinese: 10月份粗钢产量的增速也减缓了。

definition: to slow down/to ease up/to abate/slowdown/downturn
degree of reduction (in prices, numbers etc)/decline/drop
to rise again after a fall/to pick up/rally (stock market etc)
to fall back/to return to low level after a rise (in water level, price etc)
market share/abbr. for 市場佔有率|市场占有率
